MEMORANDUM
January 25, 1952
V
To: Mr* Jim Miles, Executive Director
From: Mr* John W® Dunn
SUBJECT: Regional Conference For Region 7
Immediately upon my return home from our meeting in New Xork, I
contacted all of the 11 active members of Region V regarding the proposed
regional conference. This contact was for several purposes:
1. To find out if the active members of this region agree with
their director that a regional conference is needed.
2. To ascertain if the active members would be free to ccane to
the University of Oklahoma on the tentative dates of March
26th and 29th for the regional meeting„
3o To find out just what the cost would be for a representative
from each active member to make the trip®
To ask pointedly if active members would be willing to co¬
operate in formu.lat5.rjg an agenda for the regional meeting.
As soon as I have heard from all of the active members and have
compiled a report for you, I shall forward this information to you with cer¬
tain recommendations regarding the proposed conference. I am hoping that
this can be done within the next five or six days. Certainly there will be
no delay on our part.
